subject: Football
lead_paragraph: There is a strange fixating pull to the implosion at Notre Dame, where Coach Charlie Weis’s imminent demise has become the slow-motion car crash no one can stop craning their necks to watch.
snippet: There is a strange fixating pull to the implosion at Notre Dame, where Coach Charlie Weis’s imminent demise has become the slow-motion car crash no one can stop craning their necks to watch.
